dmca.title: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd. - Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
en

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2004 9:16 AM
To: Jagex Copyright; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: [ABUSE] Jagex Ltd. - Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.
- --
Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/

Jagex Copyright wrote:
| To whom it may concern,
|
| I hereby certify under penalty of perjury that I am the owner or am
| authorised to act on behalf of the owner of the intellectual property
| rights. I have a good faith belief that the use of the material
| identified below has not been authorized by the owner, its agents or the
| law. Please promptly remove the infringing material or disable access to
| it.
|
| Name of the Intellectual Property Owner: Jagex Limited
| Name and/or Description of the Infringed Work or Right: Various artwork
| belonging to Jagex Ltd as shown on our website, http://www.runescape.com
| aswell as several references to the RuneScape name, copyright of Jagex
| Ltd. 2002
|
| Description of the Infringing Material: Various images including the
| RuneScape logo and screenshots from the RuneScape game. These images can
| be found on our website at http://www.runescape.com
|
| Location of the Infringing Material:
|
| http://www.runescape-sales.com
|
| Date: 23rd November 2004
|
| I can be contacted at:
|
| Name: Chris Endicott
| Title: Customer Support Team member
| Company: Jagex Limited
| Street Address: St Johns Innovation Centre
| City: Cambridge
| State: England
| Zip: CB4 0WS
|
| Telephone: 08707657346
| Email: chris.endicott@jagex.com
|
| I certify under penalty of perjury the truth of the above information.
|
| Regards
|
| Chris Endicott
| Jagex Ltd.
|
|
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFBpKXKvK/XpJs6oyURAlkoAKCHbPDJTN4g9kSmZU2GpgF/f/5TuwCdEFkx

=7Hvy
